Description:
Detects creation of a file named "ntds.dit" (Active Directory Database)

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: NTDS.DIT Created
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where filepath like '%ntds.dit'
